meanings.definition: Hieroglyphics: a system of writing using symbols or pictures
meanings.sent1: The ancient Egyptians used hieroglyphics to communicate important messages.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist studied the hieroglyphics on the temple walls to decipher their meaning.
meanings.sent3: The children found hieroglyphics in a book and tried to create their own secret code.
meanings.sent4: The hieroglyphics of nature are like a hidden language waiting to be understood.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphics on the tablet were so intricate, they seemed to come alive.

meanings.definition: Hieroglyphics: the symbols or pictures used in the system of writing
meanings.sent1: The hieroglyphics on the ancient scroll told a story of kings and queens.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the intricate hieroglyphics carved into the stone monument.
meanings.sent3: The hieroglyphics on the cereal box made the morning routine more interesting.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like hieroglyphics, difficult to interpret but full of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphics on the map guided them through the mysterious forest.
